page.title: 14THINGS TO DO IN EAST COKER
page.content: In East Coker there are quite a few {clubs}and opportunities to do different things. There are{Brownies,Guides,Cubs,and {Scouts.}At the Gospel Hall there is another{Youth Club. The{Wine Circle}meets regularly for tastings and competitions and also contributes to social events.The{East {Coker Players}entertain at village occasions and also put on special performances.The{Women's Institute}is also a particularly active group. For sporting types there are three {football}clubs,a{cricket}team whilst the local{sailing}club meets at the reservoir at Sutton Bingham.It is also possible to go{fishing}there. {Badminton}and{Keep Fit}take place at the village hall. There is a branch of the{British {Legion.
